item.description:
Meet for dinner at 5:45 pm. The show starts at 7:30 pm. My cell# is 508-381-1529

We have arranged a very special deal with Claflin Hill to get almost 50% off the regular ticket price. Cost is only $20 per person. (Regular price is $35) You may pay when you arrive.

Enjoy a magnificent symphony without having to go to Boston.
Beethoven’s Fifth, one of the most beloved works of the 19th century, and Shostakovich’s Fifth – his homage to the triumphant human spirit over the totalitarian regimes of the 20th century.

Click here to see a short video clip: http://www.claflinhil...

Meet at the Town Hall parking lot on Court Street. We'll walk to the Turtle Tavern across the street - casual pub.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in Town Hall parking lot at 5:45 on Court Street. Or at 7:15 at ticket booth.
item.name: Dinner and Symphony in Milford Tonight!
